name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】HOPE IS ON THE MOVE! #3DRyS [dR9q_J-8mfM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: IRyS and Tokoyami Towa perform the song 'FACT'.
MC segment where IRyS and Tokoyami Towa talk about their collaboration and hanging out off-stream.

subtitles.original: 爪を磨いたのは
subtitles.english: I polished my nails...

subtitles.original: まだ子どものようなあなたの為に
subtitles.english: ...for you, who are still like a child.

subtitles.original: ああ 試されたいなら
subtitles.english: Ah, if you want to be tested,

subtitles.original: その愚かな手錠をかけて
subtitles.english: put on those foolish handcuffs.

subtitles.original: 常夜の闇に囚われたまま
subtitles.english: Trapped in the darkness of the night,

subtitles.original: 甘い甘いガムを噛んでて
subtitles.english: keep chewing that sweet, sweet gum.

subtitles.original: いくつもの幸福を
subtitles.english: So many happinesses,

subtitles.original: さあ 捧げて
subtitles.english: come on, offer them up.

subtitles.original: さりげない合図に隠れた
subtitles.english: Hidden in a casual sign,

subtitles.original: 答えはすぐにわからせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll make you understand the answer soon.

subtitles.original: 美少な嘘にまみれた
subtitles.english: Smeared with a faint smile and lies,

subtitles.original: 拒んだままに受け止めてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll accept you just as you refuse.

subtitles.original: ほら 悲鳴を聴かせて
subtitles.english: Look, let me hear your screams.

subtitles.original: さあ 指を鳴らしたら
subtitles.english: Come, if I snap my fingers,

subtitles.original: 子猫のような私の為に
subtitles.english: for me, who is like a kitten.

subtitles.original: ああ 喉が渇いたわ
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm thirsty.

subtitles.original: 薄紅の口に指を散らして
subtitles.english: Scattering fingers on my pale red mouth.

subtitles.original: 狭い牢屋に閉じ込めたまま
subtitles.english: Trapped in a narrow prison,

subtitles.original: 首輪に繋がれたいの
subtitles.english: do you want to be tied to a collar?

subtitles.original: 下らないルールじゃ奪えない
subtitles.english: You can't take it away with worthless rules,

subtitles.original: 自由はすでにこの手の中にある
subtitles.english: freedom is already in my hands.

subtitles.original: 愛情では量れない
subtitles.english: It cannot be measured by affection,

subtitles.original: 弱ったままに選ばせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll let you choose while you're weak.

subtitles.original: ほら 心を開いて
subtitles.english: Look, open your heart.

subtitles.original: 分からないフリをして
subtitles.english: Pretending not to know,

subtitles.original: 惚けてるの？
subtitles.english: are you being absent-minded?

subtitles.original: もっと熱い暗闇を見せて
subtitles.english: Show me a hotter darkness.

subtitles.original: ねえ
subtitles.english: Hey...

subtitles.original: さりげない合図に隠れた
subtitles.english: Hidden in a casual sign,

subtitles.original: 答えはすぐにわからせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll make you understand the answer soon.

subtitles.original: 美少な嘘にまみれた
subtitles.english: Smeared with a faint smile and lies,

subtitles.original: 拒んだままに受け止めてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll accept you just as you refuse.

subtitles.original: 常夜の闇に誘うこの名を
subtitles.english: This name that invites into the darkness of night,

subtitles.original: 分からせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll make you understand.

subtitles.original: ほら 悲鳴を聴かせてよ
subtitles.english: Look, let me hear your screams.

subtitles.original: 夢見ないで
subtitles.english: Don't dream.

subtitles.original: ほら 聴かせて
subtitles.english: Look, let me hear.

subtitles.original: はい、今はトワ先輩の FACT でした！
subtitles.english: Yes, that was Towa-senpai's "FACT"!

subtitles.original: そして、本日最後のゲストのトワ先輩です！
subtitles.english: And here is the final guest for today,

subtitles.original: ご登場！
subtitles.english: Towa-senpai! Welcome!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！ホロライブ 4 期生の常闇トワ様です！
subtitles.english: Yay! I'm Tokoyami Towa-sama from Hololive 4th Gen!

subtitles.original: ヤッホー！ということで IRyS、3D 改めておめでとう！
subtitles.english: Yahoo! So IRyS, congrats again on your 3D!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！今日来てくれておつりりありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Thanks for coming today, Otsu-Ri-Ri!

subtitles.original: 呼んでくれて嬉しかった！
subtitles.english: I was happy you invited me!

subtitles.original: しかもトワの曲の FACT 歌ってくれて嬉しかったよ！
subtitles.english: And I was happy you sang Towa's song "FACT"!

subtitles.original: 絶対歌いたかった、これマジでかっこいい。
subtitles.english: I definitely wanted to sing it, it's really cool.

subtitles.original: え、しかもさ、デビューの時も Palette 歌ってくれたもんね、動画で。
subtitles.english: And you also sang "Palette" when you debuted, in a video.

subtitles.original: そう、2 回目！もうなんと 2 回目！
subtitles.english: Yes, the second time! Already the second time!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい！じゃあということでトワも IRyS の曲をカバーしないとね。
subtitles.english: I'm happy! So Towa should cover IRyS's song too.

subtitles.original: いや、そのプレッシャー、プレッシャーをかけて！
subtitles.english: No, that pressure, put pressure on me!

subtitles.original: え、っていうかしていいの？
subtitles.english: Wait, is it okay if I do?

subtitles.original: あ、もちろん！ぜひぜひ聞きたい、聞きたいよ！
subtitles.english: Ah, of course! I definitely want to hear it!

subtitles.original: ということでいつかちょっと歌枠で披露しちゃおうかななんて思います。
subtitles.english: So I'm thinking of performing it in a singing stream someday.

subtitles.original: わーい！わーい！
subtitles.english: Yay! Yay!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで...
subtitles.english: Yes, so...

subtitles.original: 実はこの二人、ちょっとどうですか？配信で二人きりみたいなのは。
subtitles.english: Actually, these two... how is it? Being just the two of us on stream.

subtitles.original: あんまりないよね。
subtitles.english: Not much, right.

subtitles.original: っていうかむしろほぼない。
subtitles.english: Or rather, almost none.

subtitles.original: そう、そうだよね。なんか大人数ではまああるけど。
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's right. Like, in a large group there is, but...

subtitles.original: もう二人ではちょっとあんまりないね。
subtitles.english: But just the two of us, not really.

subtitles.original: でも、実は結構遊んでたりしてね。
subtitles.english: But, actually, we hang out quite a bit.

subtitles.original: そうなの！そうなの、みんな、実はね。
subtitles.english: That's right! That's right, everyone, actually.

subtitles.original: そう、アフタヌーンティーに、カリもいたけど、カリと行ったりとか。
subtitles.english: Yeah, we went to afternoon tea, Calli was there too, but with Calli...

subtitles.original: あれめっちゃ美味しかった！
subtitles.english: That was so delicious!

subtitles.original: で、二人だけで夢の国行ったりとか。
subtitles.english: And we went to the "Dreamland" just the two of us.

subtitles.original: 夢の国マジで感動したんだけど。あのショーとか。
subtitles.english: Dreamland really moved me. That show and all.

subtitles.original: もうショーを二人で見て、もう色々、いやーこれはいいねって。
subtitles.english: We watched the show together and were like, "Wow, this is great."

subtitles.original: トワたちもこんな感じでやりたいねなんて言って。
subtitles.english: Towa and I said we wanted to do something like that.

subtitles.original: あとスプラッシュでびしょ濡れ。
subtitles.english: And getting soaked at Splash Mountain.

subtitles.original: そう、びしょ濡れになったわ！マジで！
subtitles.english: Yes, we got soaked! Seriously!

subtitles.original: びしょ濡れだったね、あれマジ楽しかった！
subtitles.english: We were soaked, that was seriously fun!

subtitles.original: 楽しかったね。そう、意外とね、裏じゃ、裏というかまあ配信外でちょっと遊んだりしてたんですよ。
subtitles.english: It was fun. Yeah, unexpectedly, outside of streaming, we've been hanging out.

subtitles.original: そう、だからこういう大きな場所でなんかトワ先輩と話すのはなんか、つい素、素が出ちゃう感じがして。
subtitles.english: So, talking with Towa-senpai in a big place like this makes my true self come out.

subtitles.original: いやー、いいよ、その素で嬉しいよ。
subtitles.english: Well, that's fine, I'm happy you're being yourself.

subtitles.original: しかもちょっと 3D で並ぶのも若干恥ずかしいところもあるわ。
subtitles.english: And standing together in 3D is also a bit embarrassing.

subtitles.original: 何言ってんすか！トワ先輩可愛いじゃないですか！
subtitles.english: What are you saying! Towa-senpai, you're cute!

subtitles.original: ありがとう。スタイルがいい IRyS さん、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you. Miss IRyS with the good figure, thank you very much.

subtitles.original: ありがとう。この身長差が目立ちますけど。
subtitles.english: Thank you. This height difference stands out though.

subtitles.original: 身長差可愛いよ！
subtitles.english: The height difference is cute!
